title: Removal of $10 Cards?
body: I was just gonna go get a card at my local shops to get a $10Rp card... I go into the shops and there was only $25 ones. I was quite surprised because I knew that they always sold $10 cards. I go into EB Games and see they haven't got it too... and they aren't out of stock because I asked and they said they don't sell them anymore. Is this True Riot? Are you done with $10 RP? (Btw they weren't the only shops I looked in. I searched everywhere and I mean EVERYWHERE for one)

replies.body:
where i am they haven't sold them for months i don't think.
it makes me sad :c
they still sell them in my area

yeah I searched JB and couldn't even find it
I went thru
EB
JB
WoolWorths
Coles
7/11
Have you tried getting them at JB Hifi? or even Woolworths near the cards section. I got one today so I'm sure they are there.
I saw $10 RP cards at JB Hifi like 2 days ago.
Pretty funny  actually, I went into jb hifi today and picked up a 10$?
